name: ShootSquare
description:
ShootSquare is a 2D game where you play Square, a literal square that is fighting the entities that are invanding home. This was my first game ever, developed in Unity in the course of a single week, using my skills in C# and all of that while learning design concepts (that's why the design is so simple). My purpose was to build a 100% working game without game breaking bugs, and here it is. 

This is the prototype of a game, and while the premise is simple it can be quite challenging. I implemented difficulty based on points, so the more points you have, the more difficult it gets. 

The question isn't if you will die in this game, trust me, you will, the real question is how far can you get?

___________________________

Gameplay

Destroy enemies, manage your remaining bullets and get the most points.

___________________________

Gameplay Features
  • 2 different enemy types: raging from the Brutos, a red block that will follow you and be constantly in your way, to the purple Viper, a rectangule that will shoot from a distance, and when you try to get closer... she just might run away!
  • Increasingly difficult: the more points you get, the more enemies will spawn. Simple as that.
  • Manage your bullets: you could be shooting everywhere... except not! You have limited bullets to increasingly difficult enemies spawning around you. It's up to you how you use your attacks!

___________________________

Notes
  • This is a prototype, with one functional level and two different enemies.
  • The initial idea was a simple arena where you battle enemies.
  • I have countless concepts that I want to bring to this game, such as power-ups, abilites, reworked designs, sound, pause menu, and many more.
  • I hope you guys enjoy this game, while simple, it was my first game ever, so I'm very proud of it.
  • Share your scores!

Thank you all!
